content.title: Give
content.description: We're so grateful for the generosity of our community. We steward our resources wisely and prayerfully, and continue to reach spiritually curious people to help them meaningfully engage with the message of Jesus. Your donations fuel our ministry and make this possible.

content.text1: In this difficult season the opportunity to have meaningful impact is huge. If youâ€™re wondering "What can I do? How can I make a difference?" this is your opportunity. Your giving fuels our vision to grow as disciples, care for people, and go into our neighbourhoods to introduce spiritually curious people to the Jesus-centred life.
content.text2: Everything you give fuels our vision:
content.text3: Teaching, home church, livestream, as well as kids, youth, young adult, and care ministries. Support the core ministries that help us grow as disciples and equip us to go into our communities to reach spiritually curious people by giving to the General Fund.
content.text4: We love and serve in practical ways by partnering with vulnerable people as we journey toward relationship, justice, and peace. Give to the Compassion Fund to support our local compassion partners, as well as our global partnerships with BIC Canada Global, MCC, and World Vision.
content.text5: Create even greater Kingdom impact by investing in innovative projects that help more people meaningfully engage the life and teaching of Jesus by giving to the Go Fund. This fund is the rocket fuel that supports ground breaking initiatives like Jesus Collective, TMHU and our One Story kids and youth curriculum.
content.text6: YES - I want to help make disciples.
